definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: We are willing to negotiate with them as long as there are no pre-conditions.
sentences.chinese: 只要没有前提条件，我们愿意与他们谈判。

sentences.english: Of course, outer freedom is the premiss and basis for inner freedom.
sentences.chinese: 当然，外在自由是内在自由的前提和基础。

sentences.english: It belongs to the scope of personal liberty and is some.
sentences.chinese: 人身自由是公民全部权利中最基础的和前提性的部分。

sentences.english: To obtain the local stress distribution of the K-tubular joint, sub-model was built and calculated.
sentences.chinese: 这是进行其上局部K型管节点疲劳强度分析的前提。

sentences.english: A high single plant yield is very important to population's yield in high-Density condition.
sentences.chinese: 在高密度条件下高的单株产量乃是高产的重要前提。

sentences.english: Application-layer traffic identification and control is the precondition of network billing and management.
sentences.chinese: 应用层流量识别及控制是网络计费和网络管理的前提。

sentences.english: The question complex of Dostoevsky's creation is for the testing of the precondition of humanity which takes freedom, guiltiness , belief as its basic ideas.
sentences.chinese: 陀思妥耶夫斯基创作的问题意识是对人性前提的论证。

sentences.english: The property relationship is the premising constituent of the embezzling crime for its specific character.
sentences.chinese: 具有特定性质的财产关系是侵占罪成立的前提条件。

sentences.english: Read the documentation for an up-to-date list of prerequisites.
sentences.chinese: 请阅读前提条件中最新的列表。

sentences.english: The informative function is the premise, while the vocative function serves as the ultimate goal.
sentences.chinese: 信息功能是前提，祈使功能是最终要达到的目的。

sentences.english: In a delicate exercise, charities are trying to present their agenda without usurping the mayor.
sentences.chinese: 慈善机构正在不篡夺市长权力的前提下，尽力想方案。

sentences.english: The cabin subdivision and the generating of cabin data are prerequisite for the calculation of ship stability.
sentences.chinese: 船舶分舱及舱室数据的生成是船舶稳性计算的前提。

sentences.english: Understanding Zhouese cultural concept is the important premise of deep research on ShiJing .
sentences.chinese: 清理周人的文化观念是深入探究《诗经》的重要前提。

sentences.english: Thermal denaturation of soy proteins is a pre-requisite for tofu-gel formation.
sentences.chinese: 蛋白质的热变性是制作豆腐形成凝胶的前提。

sentences.english: Characterized by an authoritative, arrogant assertion of unproved or unprovable principles.
sentences.chinese: 在争论中作为前提提出的未经证明的陈述。

sentences.english: This is the prerequisite for striking a deal at COP15.
sentences.chinese: 这是COP15能够达成协议的前提。

definition: only if (..., or otherwise, ...)/only when/only in the case that/unless
in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
in a nutshell/to put it briefly
